Moo::VertexSnapshotCache

Detailed Description

The VertexSnapshotCache class implements a buffer of reusable VertexSnapshots.

It does this to avoid allocating new vertex snapshots on the heap every frame.

The cache infers when a vertex snapshot is unused via its reference count - when its 1 then only the cache has a reference to the snapshot, and thus it can be reused. So don't keep smart pointers to these objects any longer than you need to.

The class is templatised via its get function, don't call this get function on a single cache instance using two different template parameters for get(). Instead, hold a cache per VertexSnapshot specialisation.
